org.ogcs.event

接口 EventDispatcher

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MultiListenerEventDispatcher, SingleListenerEventDispatcher

    public interface EventDispatcher
    Generic Event Dispatcher Interface. The EventDispatcher Interface is the base class for all classes that dispatch events.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    作者:
    TinyZ
    另请参阅:
    EventListener

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addEventListener(java.lang.Object type, EventListener listener)
      Register a EventListener to dispatcher
      void dispatchEvent(Event event)
      Dispatches an event to all objects that have registered listeners for its type.
      void dispatchEvent(java.lang.Object type, java.lang.Object trigger, java.lang.Object source)
      Dispatches an event with the given parameters to all objects that have registered listeners for the given type.
      boolean hasEventListener(java.lang.Object type)
      If the listener list exist special type event listener.
      boolean hasEventListener(java.lang.Object type, EventListener listener)
      If the listener list exist special type event listener.
      void removeEventListener(java.lang.Object type, EventListener listener)
      Remove the EventListener by unique listener id.
      void removeEventListeners()
      Removes all listeners of all types.
      void removeEventListeners(java.lang.Object type)
      Removes all listeners for the specified type

    • 方法详细资料

      • addEventListener

        void addEventListener(java.lang.Object type,
                      EventListener listener)
        Register a EventListener to dispatcher
        参数:
        type - The event type
        listener - An object extend EventListener and that method will be called when the event is dispatched.

      • dispatchEvent

        void dispatchEvent(Event event)
        Dispatches an event to all objects that have registered listeners for its type.
        参数:
        event - The dispatched event

      • dispatchEvent

        void dispatchEvent(java.lang.Object type,
                   java.lang.Object trigger,
                   java.lang.Object source)
        Dispatches an event with the given parameters to all objects that have registered listeners for the given type.
        参数:
        type - The event type
        trigger - The event trigger
        source - The event source

      • removeEventListeners

        void removeEventListeners()
        Removes all listeners of all types.

      • removeEventListeners

        void removeEventListeners(java.lang.Object type)
        Removes all listeners for the specified type
        参数:
        type - The event type

      • removeEventListener

        void removeEventListener(java.lang.Object type,
                         EventListener listener)
        Remove the EventListener by unique listener id.
        参数:
        type - The event type
        listener - the event listener.

      • hasEventListener

        boolean hasEventListener(java.lang.Object type)
        If the listener list exist special type event listener.
        参数:
        type - The event type
        返回:
        Return true if any listener with special type is exist. otherwise false.

      • hasEventListener

        boolean hasEventListener(java.lang.Object type,
                         EventListener listener)
        If the listener list exist special type event listener.
        参数:
        type - The event type
        listener - The special listener
        返回:
        Return true if the listener with special type is exist. otherwise false.
